qas.question: Who are the primary officials for enforcing hunting laws?
What is the purpose of the Report a Polluter, Poacher Program (RAPP)?
answers: To set out guidelines to help you report persons who violate hunting laws.
To keep people from incorrectly categorizing their recyclables
To set out guidelines under which you can make a citizens' arrest of polluters and poachers
To provide a mechanism to enforce a protocol of politeness among hunters

qas.question: What are two examples of municipal (town) bylaws?
answers: Noise abatement bylaw and No discharge of firearms bylaw
No shooting zone bylaw and No motor vehicles bylaw
No idling bylaw and No loitering bylaw
No rottweilers bylaw and No cowbell bylaw
